title: Billy Goat

properties.value: A Billy Goat is a larger version of a goat, and is found in most of the same places. There are brown and tan coloured billy goats, but serve no difference in combat.

A Billy Goat is a larger version of a goat, and is found in most of the same places. There are brown and tan coloured billy goats, but serve no difference in combat.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Kharidian Desert336Maplink
South of the Ruins of Unkah335Maplink
  • South-east of the Shantay Pass, north of Pollnivneach
  • North of Sophanem, east of the quest start point for Icthlarin's Little Helper
  • West of Nardah Bank
  • North-west edge of Nardah, south of fairy ring code DLQ
  • North-west of Uzer, near the mine
  • South-west of the entrance to the Kalphite Lair, near fairy ring code BIQ
  • South of the Ruins of Unkah

Drops[edit | edit source]

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always690
Desert goat horn1Always557

Note that after completing the easy set of the Desert Diary, the desert horn will always be dropped as a note rather than the actual item.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2015
(update | poll)

Billy goats now drop desert goat horns in noted form if you have completed the Desert Medium Diary.


Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Their examine text is "They'll eat anything!", a reference to the urban legend that goats will eat anything.
v • d • e

A '''Billy Goat''' is a larger version of a [[goat]], and is found in most of the same places. There are brown and tan coloured billy goats, but serve no difference in [[combat]].

==Locations==
{{LocTableHead}}
{{LocLine
|name = Billy Goat
|location = [[Kharidian Desert]]
|levels = 33
|members = Yes
|mapID = 0
|plane = 0
|x:3364,y:3034|x:3324,y:2841|x:3397,y:2932|x:3413,y:2888|x:3208,y:3080|x:3437,y:3154
|mtype = pin
}}
{{LocLine
|name = Billy Goat
|location = South of the [[Ruins of Unkah]]
|levels = 33
|members = Yes
|mapID = 0
|plane = 0
|x:3162,y:2785|x:3175,y:2795|x:3181,y:2763|x:3163,y:2783|x:3182,y:2761
|mtype = pin
}}
{{LocTableBottom}}

*South-east of the [[Shantay Pass]], north of [[Pollnivneach]]
*North of [[Sophanem]], east of the quest start point for [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]]
*West of [[Nardah]] Bank
*North-west edge of [[Nardah]], south of [[fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|DLQ}}
*North-west of [[Uzer]], near the mine
*South-west of the entrance to the [[Kalphite Lair]], near [[fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|BIQ}}
*South of the [[Ruins of Unkah]]

==Drops==
===100%===
{{DropsTableHead}}
{{DropsLine|name=Bones|quantity=1|rarity=Always}}
{{DropsLine|name=Desert goat horn|quantity=1|rarity=Always}}
{{DropsTableBottom}}

Note that after completing the easy set of the [[Desert Diary]], the desert horn will '''always''' be dropped as a note rather than the actual item.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 5 March 2015
|update = Achievement Diaries
|poll = Old School Achievement Diary Rewards Poll
|change = Billy goats now drop [[desert goat horn]]s in noted form if you have completed the [[Desert Medium Diary]].
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}


==Trivia==
* Their examine text is "They'll eat anything!", a reference to the urban legend that goats will eat anything.

{{Nardah}}
